mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_user AS "createUser", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.status AS "status", a.update_user AS "updateUser", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.version AS "version", a.code AS "code", a.folder_authorize AS "folderAuthorize", a.limit_size AS "limitSize", a.name AS "name", a.sort AS "sort", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", p.name AS "parent.name", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.path AS "path", a.remark AS "remark", a.type AS "type", a.user_id AS "userId"
LEFT JOIN t_disk_folder p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_disk_folder a
ORDER BY ${entityPage.orderBy} ${entityPage.order}
ORDER BY a.update_time DESC
SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM t_disk_folder a WHERE a.status = #{STATUS_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.sort ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_disk_folder( id, status, version, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, code, folder_authorize, limit_size, name, sort, parent_id, parent_ids, path, remark, type, user_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{status}, 1, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{code}, #{folderAuthorize}, #{limitSize}, #{name}, #{sort}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{path}, #{remark}, #{type}, #{userId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_disk_folder SET status = #{status}, version = version +1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = #{updateTime}, code = #{code}, folder_authorize = #{folderAuthorize}, limit_size = #{limitSize}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, parent_id = #{parentId}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, path = #{path}, remark = #{remark}, type = #{type}, user_id = #{userId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE t_disk_folder SET status = #{STATUS_DELETE}, version = version +1, update_user = #{updateUser}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE (id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%') '%,'||#{id}||',%')
